item.title: Is Ruby on Rails Still Relevant in 2021
item.description: You have been thinking of learning Ruby on Rails in 2021. You even started tinkering with Ruby and you love how quirky, dynamic and fun it makes you feel. But then, it’s not long until you find questions such as: And you start questioning yourself: “What if RoR is a dying domain? Will I be better going with Python, Go?” Although you are certain you don’t want to go with the traditional web dev JS road, you are not convinced Ruby on Rails is a good path to go.
